Posts.EditableText: I just wanted to say hello. I discovered this place today and find it very interesting so far! As someone who is just getting interested in coding, I think the forums here are a fantastic resource and the games are very neat. I play an online text-based MUD Lord of the Rings game (t2tmud.org), so these game seem familiar even though they're different.

Posts.EditableText: I myself used quest to learn coding from knowing absolutely nothing at all, so if you are interested in learning to code, let me know, as I'll be glad to help, both with quest and/or its coding, and with coding in general (non-quest: C++, Java, Python, HTML/XML, etc) to varying degrees...
